text: Parliamentary elections were held in Laos on 1 January 1967.Dieter Nohlen, Florian Grotz & Christof Hartmann (2001) Elections in Asia: A data handbook, Volume II, p135 The elections saw the universal franchise restored (the 1965 elections had been limited to politicians, civil servants, army officers, police and local government officers), and the voting age lowered back to 18.Nohlen et al., p133 ==References== Category:1967 elections in Asia Category:1967 in Laos Category:Elections in Laos
title: 1967 Laotian parliamentary election
